entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is trying to help Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is being dragged by Scabbers into a gap in the roots.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends who shrieks with pain and falls.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: The dog that is dragging Ron into a gap in the roots.

entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: A tree with branches that are creaking and whipping through the air.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to help Ron who is being dragged by Scabbers into a gap in the roots.
Scabbers is dragging Ron backward into a large gap in the roots.
